title: Loft~1Bed1Bath~High Ceillings~Elvator~Washer/Dryer~WIC
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Available For October 24th

Nearest Transportation F/A/C 2/3 R/ 4.5, East River Ferry & Water Taxi.

Loft Style 1Bed 1Bath, Corner unit, 1366 Sq. Ft,  large windows, huge living room

-Dishwasher/microwave
-Laundry in unit
-Hardwood floors
-King Size bedroom
-Walk in closet/custom closet  
-Beams
-High Ceilings
-Elevator
-Storage/bike storage

*Requirements
Good credit and 40x Rent
Security/1st month rent at lease signing/1Month Broker fee

For serious inquire please call or email
